body: Welp the power of rule 34 is always there anyway cant wait for her to make an appearance in the anime

I think Konosuba is getting a 3rd season, so we might finally get Iris animated. Each season has done 2 volumes so far, so a third season should cover the trip to the Crimson Magic Village and Kazuma's "trip" to the capital.
I favorite Iris in konosiba,so thank your effort!

i'm more surprised as the fact she's not made any appearance in anime yet, and yet she already got a doujin of her
and if someone want to know when she'll make an appearance you have to wait after Arcanteia>Home of Crimson Magic>Kingdom of Belzerg this is when Iris make an appearance
for those who didn't read the LN, iris is the princess of the kingdom they live in. she is OP as fuck
